data.description: <p><b>Job Description</b></p> <p>Are you an ambitious undergraduate student eager to make a significant impact in the tech world? Join us as a Software Engineer Intern in our Global Industries team. This internship is perfect for those who are passionate about creating next-generation services and solutions.</p> <p><b>Internship Duration:</b> May-August 2026 or June-September 2026</p> <p><b>The Program:</b></p> <p>We are dedicated to nurturing world-class talent who seek to innovate and solve complex problems across various industries. This internship program will enhance your learning experience, build your network, and accelerate your opportunity to make a meaningful contribution.</p> <p><b>The Organization:</b></p> <p>The Global Industry Unit (GIU) specializes in developing and operating industry-specific cloud applications. With a team of over 23,000 employees, we tackle some of the most intricate business challenges across numerous industries globally. Our ongoing investment of over $700 million annually fuels cutting-edge research and development.</p> <ul> <li>Reach more than 16 million users across nearly 200,000 cloud customers in over 120 countries.</li> <li>Leverage Oracle Cloud technology to address real-world issues.</li> </ul> <p><b>Industries We Serve:</b></p> <ul> <li><b>Communication:</b> Supporting service providers and enterprises.</li> <li><b>Construction & Engineering:</b> Aiding critical asset planning and operation.</li> <li><b>Energy & Water:</b> Providing essential support for utilities worldwide.</li> <li><b>Financial Services:</b> Enhancing core banking and regulatory operations.</li> <li><b>Hospitality:</b> Revolutionizing guest experiences in accommodations globally.</li> <li><b>Life Sciences:</b> Innovating applications to improve lives.</li> <li><b>Local Government:</b> Enabling agencies to better connect with citizens.</li> <li><b>Restaurants:</b> Supporting successful dining establishments worldwide.</li> <li><b>Retail:</b> Empowering commerce for 5,750 retailers in 96 countries.</li> </ul> <p><b>Your Role:</b></p> <p>As a Software Engineer Intern, you will work on challenging projects, writing code and building innovative systems from the ground up. You'll engage in testing and debugging Oracle software and explore cutting-edge technologies in a collaborative, agile environment.</p> <p><b>What We Are Looking For:</b></p> <ul> <li>Must be currently enrolled in a Bachelor's degree program in Computer Science or a related field and returning to school after the internship.</li> <li>Proficiency in at least two of the following programming languages: Java, Python, C#, SQL, JavaScript, CSS, HTML.</li> <li>Experience in at least three of the following areas: Artificial Intelligence, Algorithms, Big Data, Data Structures, Database, Machine Learning, Object-Oriented Programming, Software Programming, Web/Mobile Development, Micro-Services Architecture, Container Architecture (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes), User Interface Design.</li> <li>At least one completed internship, research assistantship, or relevant practical experience.</li> </ul> <p><b>Preferred Qualifications:</b></p> <p>Minimum 3.0 GPA is preferred.</p> <p><b>Additional Information:</b></p> <p>This position does not offer visa sponsorship. You must reside in the United States and/or attend a university in the US.</p> <p><b>Compensation:</b> Hiring Range in USD is from $19.62 to $53.00 per hour, equating to approximately $40,800 to $110,240 per annum.</p> <p>As part of Oracle's commitment to inclusivity, we welcome applicants from diverse backgrounds. Should you require accessibility assistance at any stage of the application process, please reach out to us. We are an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and value a workforce that thrives on diversity.</p>
